Package org.simplity.kernel.data

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommonDataInterface
    Default generic data structure that can be used as memory organization for implementing any logic.
    DataSheet
    A data sheet is a run-time data storage for tabular data - rows of data with each row having values for each of the columns.
    DataSheetIterator
    In this iterator, we do not use a row explicitly, but implicitly by changing the default row of the sheet.
    FieldsInterface
    A simple name-value pair Map.we have created this wrapper class to allow us to extend it
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonData
    Default generic data structure that is created for implementing a service.
    DataRow
    a row inside a data sheet.
    DataRows
    object returned by DataSheetInterface for iteration
    DynamicSheet
    represents a fields collection internally, but implements all methods of a data sheet.
    Fields
    represents a fields collection internally, but implements all methods of a data sheet.
    HierarchicalSheet
    represents a data sheet that is organized as a child of another sheet.
    MultiRowsSheet
    a sheet with possibly more than one rows.
    SingleRowSheet
    represents a sheet with exactly one row of data.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataPurpose
    why is the data being input?
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AlreadyIteratingException
    caller is asking for an iterator on a sheet that is already being iterated.
    ParseException
    exception thrown in case of parse errors.
Author:
simplity.org
